title: Realized Karthus is confirmed gay.
body:
If you watch the pentakill video 
https://i.imgur.com/vnUUihF.png At the bottom of his to do list it says "have a boyfriend."  Soo yea Maybe it was before he became a walking skeleton, but Varus had his video soon after pentakill's. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}  Maybe the idea was to ship them, but felt I'd point it out if nobody noticed.
